content:
Hi all,

I'm trying to install vscode + lean4.

I've followed the instructions here:

https://github.com/leanprover/lean4/blob/master/doc/quickstart.md

Screenshot-2023-07-26-at-21.28.34.png

I can both open Lean Infoview and compile a HelloWorld program in the terminal (as shown in the screenshot).

But I can't get to see anything useful in the Infoview (it just shows Error Updating {}).

If I hover over #eval main let's say I get busily processing...

Any suggestions on how to debug this?
OK nevermind, problem solved. I had to restart vscode to finalise update. Actually going to Output and selecting Lean helped solve the problem
Adam Kurkiewicz has marked this topic as resolved.
